name: Sami Anwari
personality: Determined and skilled, but also hot-headed
story: Khalil grew up in Iran during a time of conflict and unrest. He saw his family and friends suffer at the hand of those in power, and decided to join the military to fight for a better future. With his skills in explosives and surveillance, he was chosen to be a Recon Demo Specialist, and has been carrying out secret missions against enemy forces ever since.
